reviewText: I cant really say a great deal about this film as my copy was faulty and picture kept freezing but from the scenes I did get to see it looked ok there is not English subtitles which could present a problem if you don't speak mandarin because this is a Chinese product which has sex scenes more akin to soft  core than hard core so they fill the film out with more storyline around characters instead the girl are pretty enough but sex scenes I saw  were not really erotic and as previously said more soft core it really depends on what you prefer soft or hard
